messages.title: LOCAL PEOPLE ARE BACKING ROBIN WALKER
messages.content: Robin is standing up for Worcester

mentions.candidate: Robin Walker has been a strong voice for Worcester. He has supported city's bid for the Great British Railways HQ.

issues.education: Robin Walker worked to secure more funding for every school in Worcester and for Worcester's colleges during the pandemic.
issues.environment: Robin Walker has backed the Environment Bill, which sets ambitious targets for air quality, water, biodiversity, and waste reduction.
issues.health: Robin Walker helped secure the future of the Worcester Acute Hospitals NHS Trust with a Â£15 million investment.

leaflet.additionalNotes: The leaflet highlights Robin Walker's support for Worcester's bid for the Great British Railways HQ and mentions his efforts in securing increased funding for local schools and investment in the local NHS Trust.
